alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 4:21PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madison and southeastern Limestone Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tanner, or 7 miles northeast of Decatur, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Decatur, Madison, Athens, Redstone Arsenal, Triana, Marshall Space Flight Center, University Of Alabama In Huntsville, Huntsville International Airport and Tanner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
